# The covaraince matrix for the flattened smearing matrix
#
# The smearing matrix is flattened from a 2D 6x6 matrix (with indices [reco][truth]), to a 1D 36x1 column vector (with index [reco/6 + truth%6])
# This file contains a 36x36 covariance matrix for this flattened smearing matrix
